messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Current temp Grand Canyon. I can't read Celsius.

I don’t have direct access to real-time weather data, but I can certainly convert Celsius to Fahrenheit for you. Could you tell me:

1. What current temperature (in °C) you’re seeing?  
2. Which part of the Grand Canyon you mean (e.g. South Rim, North Rim, Desert View)?  

Once I have the °C value, I’ll convert it to °F right away.
Sorry, I don't have that info either. Could you look it up yourself?

I’m sorry, but I don’t have access to real-time weather feeds. I recommend checking a trusted weather service—like weather.com, AccuWeather, NOAA, or your phone’s weather app—for the current temperature at the Grand Canyon (specify South Rim, North Rim, etc., if you can).

If you can grab the reading in Celsius, let me know and I’ll convert it to Fahrenheit for you right away.

I’m still not able to pull live weather data directly. You’ll need to grab the current reading (in °C) from a weather service—here are a few easy options:

 • Go to weather.com or AccuWeather and search “Grand Canyon South Rim” (or “North Rim,” etc.).  
 • Ask your phone’s built-in weather app or a smart speaker: “What’s the current temperature at the Grand Canyon?”  
 • Use a quick web search: “Grand Canyon South Rim current temperature”  

Once you have the temperature in Celsius, just let me know the number and I’ll instantly convert it into Fahrenheit for you.  
   
If you’d like to do the math yourself, here’s the formula:  
°F = (°C × 9/5) + 32  

Example: 20 °C × 9/5 = 36; 36 + 32 = 68 °F.
If you still can't access it, it might be best to check it on your phone's weather app or a website.

I’m still not able to pull live weather data directly. Your best bet is to check a reliable weather source—your phone’s built-in app, a site like weather.com or NOAA, or a quick web search for “Grand Canyon South Rim current temperature.”  

Once you have the Celsius reading, just let me know the number and I’ll convert it to Fahrenheit right away. Sorry I can’t fetch the live data myself!
